content.json:
This dashboard surfaces browser telemetry from uberAgent, focused on Chrome-based web activity. Insights include page load times, HTTP error trends, bandwidth usage, and top applications by I/O and more.

User Search: use \\\ for Domain\\\User or Username

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');

uberAgent_Application_BrowserPerformanceChrome_CL
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize AvgNet = avg(NetKBPS_d) by Computer
| top 10 by AvgNet desc
| project ['Machine'] = Computer, ['Avg Browser Net (KBps)'] = round(AvgNet, 1)
content.title: Top Machines by Browser Network Usage

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');
uberAgent_Application_BrowserWebRequests2_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| summarize AvgPageLoadMs = avg(PageLoadTotalDurationMs_d), RequestCount = count() by RequestHost_s
| top 10 by AvgPageLoadMs desc
| project ['Host'] = RequestHost_s, ['Avg Load Time (ms)'] = round(AvgPageLoadMs, 1), ['Requests'] = RequestCount
content.title: Top 10 Slowest Websites

content.query:
uberAgent_Application_BrowserWebRequests2_CL
| summarize Total5xx = sum(HttpStatusCount5xx_d), Total4xx = sum(HttpStatusCount4xx_d) by RequestHost_s
| top 10 by Total5xx desc
| project ['Host'] = RequestHost_s, ['HTTP 5xx Errors'] = Total5xx, ['HTTP 4xx Errors'] = Total4xx
content.title: Top Sites with HTTP Errors

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
let UserFilter = iff("{User}" == "*" or isempty("{User}"), "", "{User}");

uberAgent_Application_BrowserPerformanceChrome_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| summarize BandwidthMB = sum(NetKBPS_d) / 1024.0 by Computer, ProcUser_s
| top 10 by BandwidthMB desc
| project ['User'] = ProcUser_s, ['Computer'] = Computer, ['Bandwidth Used (MB)'] = round(BandwidthMB, 1)
content.title: Top Devices by Browser Bandwidth

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');

uberAgent_Application_BrowserPerformanceChrome_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| summarize CPU = avg(CPUPercent_d), RAM = avg(WorkingSetMB_d), IO = avg(IOPS_d) by ProcUser_s
| top 10 by CPU desc
| project ['User'] = ProcUser_s, ['CPU %'] = round(CPU, 1), ['RAM (MB)'] = round(RAM, 1), ['IOPS'] = round(IO, 1)
content.title: Top Users by Browser Resource Usage

content.query:
uberAgent_Application_BrowserWebRequests2_CL
| extend TLD = extract(@"\.([a-z]{2,})$", 1, RequestHost_s)
| where TLD in~ ("ru", "xyz", "cn", "tk", "kp")
| summarize Hits = count() by ProcUser_s, Computer, TLD
| sort by Hits desc
content.title: Unusual Access to Domains ("ru", "xyz", "cn", "tk", "kp")

content.query:
uberAgent_Application_BrowserWebRequests2_CL
| where PageLoadTotalDurationMs_d > 0
| summarize AvgLoadTimeMs = round(avg(PageLoadTotalDurationMs_d), 1), Count = count() 
  by RequestHost_s
| sort by AvgLoadTimeMs desc
| top 10 by AvgLoadTimeMs
content.title: Top Slow-Loading Websites

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff('{Machine}' == '*' or isempty('{Machine}'), '', '{Machine}');
let UserFilter = iff('{User}' == '*' or isempty('{User}'), '', '{User}');
uberAgent_Application_BrowserWebRequests2_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| summarize Count4xx = sum(HttpStatusCount4xx_d), Count5xx = sum(HttpStatusCount5xx_d) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| project TimeGenerated, ['HTTP 4xx Errors'] = Count4xx, ['HTTP 5xx Errors'] = Count5xx
| render timechart
content.title: HTTP Errors Over Time

content.query:
uberAgent_Application_BrowserWebRequests2_CL
| summarize AvgRenderTime = avg(PageLoadRenderDurationMs_d), AvgNetworkTime = avg(PageLoadNetworkDurationMs_d) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| project TimeGenerated, ['Render Time (ms)'] = round(AvgRenderTime, 1), ['Network Time (ms)'] = round(AvgNetworkTime, 1)
| render timechart
content.title: Render vs. Network Load Time

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
let UserFilter = iff("{User}" == "*" or isempty("{User}"), "", "{User}");

uberAgent_Application_BrowserWebRequests2_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| where isnotempty(RequestHost_s)
| summarize Visits = count() by RequestHost_s, ProcUser_s, Computer
| sort by Visits desc
content.title: ðŸ”Ž Top Domains Accessed by User and Machine
